Package pl.put.poznan.buildinginfo.logic

Class FloorTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.put.poznan.buildinginfo.logic.FloorTransformer
  • @Component
public class FloorTransformer
extends Object
    This class is responsible for transforming floor data, including calculating various parameters such as area, cube, light levels, and heating costs for a specific floor in a building.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FloorTransformer​(MainTransformer mainTransformer)
      Constructor that initializes the FloorTransformer with a MainTransformer.

      Returns the cube of the floor.

      Returns the cost of heating energy for the floor over a given number of days.

    • Method Detail

      • getAreaOfFloor

        public String getAreaOfFloor​(int buildingId,
                             int floorId)
        Returns the area of the floor.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - The unique identifier of the building.
        floorId - The unique identifier of the floor.
        Returns:
        A string representing the area of the floor, or an error message if not found.

      • getCubeOfFloor

        public String getCubeOfFloor​(int buildingId,
                             int floorId)
        Returns the cube of the floor.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - The unique identifier of the building.
        floorId - The unique identifier of the floor.
        Returns:
        A string representing the cube of the floor, or an error message if not found.

      • getLightOfFloor

        public String getLightOfFloor​(int buildingId,
                              int floorId)
        Returns the lighting level of the floor.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - The unique identifier of the building.
        floorId - The unique identifier of the floor.
        Returns:
        A string representing the average lighting of the floor in lux per square meter, or an error message if not found.

      • getHeatingOfFloor

        public String getHeatingOfFloor​(int buildingId,
                                int floorId)
        Returns the heating consumption of the floor.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - The unique identifier of the building.
        floorId - The unique identifier of the floor.
        Returns:
        A string representing the average heating consumption of the floor per cubic meter, or an error message if not found.

      • getHeatingCostOfFloor

        public String getHeatingCostOfFloor​(int buildingId,
                                    int floorId,
                                    int numberOfDays,
                                    float price)
        Returns the cost of heating energy for the floor over a given number of days.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - The unique identifier of the building.
        floorId - The unique identifier of the floor.
        numberOfDays - The number of days over which the heating cost is calculated.
        price - The price per unit of energy.
        Returns:
        A string representing the total heating cost for the floor over the specified number of days, or an error message if not found.
